**Welding and Fabricating Services Tender Announcent**
=============================================

### Service Name
------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide Welding and Fabricating Services for the Transportation Electrical and Mechanical Engineering Flight (TEME Flt), 8 Wing Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton.

### Tender Details
-----------------

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4628776956-Doc4659962311
* **Publication Date**: 2024-07-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-17T14:00:00 (Extended Due to Amendment)

### Services Required
---------------------

The successful contractor will be required to supply labour, materials and equipment to perform all types of welding, fabricating and machining services using various materials, including but not limited to steel, aluminum, and stainless steel, on various types of equipment, components, and attachments.

### Contract Details
------------------

* **Contract Term**: From the date of issuance until August 31, 2027
* **Standing Offer**: One (1) standing offer for Welding and Fabricating Services - PSIB Stream is expected to be issued
* **Contract Start Date**: 2024-09-03
* **Contract Expiry Date**: None (open-ended)

### Key Information
------------------

* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20193848?extsite=MjAxOTM4NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Contact Information**: Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
    sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Requirements
--------------

All required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by 2024-07-17T14:00:00. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Background
------------

The Transportation Electrical and Mechanical Engineering Flight (TEME Flt) requires a contractor to perform a range of welding, fabricating, and machining services for various types of equipment, components, and attachments.

### Restrictions
-------------

* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement and other international free trade agreements apply
* **Regions Of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions Of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)
